title: Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu - Count, Letters & Link (3in1) | Math, Words, Magnetic Blocks, Puzzles | 4-10 Years STEM Toys | Gift Boys & Girls (Works with iPads, iPhones, Samsung tabs, Kindle Fire)
descriptions:
**Unlock Your Child's Full Potential with the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu**

Are you looking for a fun and engaging way to introduce your child to the world of STEM? Look no further than the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu, a comprehensive 3-in-1 kit designed for kids aged 4-10 years. This innovative learning system combines math, vocabulary, puzzles, and magnetic blocks to create an immersive and interactive experience that will leave your child eager to learn more.

**Develop Essential Skills**

The Plugo STEM Pack is designed to develop a range of essential skills, including:

* Counting and arithmetic
* Linguistic and comprehension skills
* Problem-solving and critical thinking
* Fine-motor skills and hand-eye coordination

**Three Exciting Kits in One**

The Plugo STEM Pack includes three exciting kits:

* Plugo Count: Learn math concepts through interactive games and activities
* Plugo Letters: Develop linguistic skills through word-building and vocabulary exercises
* Plugo Link: Solve puzzles and develop problem-solving skills with magnetic blocks

**Adaptive Learning for Every Child**

The Plugo app offers 15 interactive games and over 750 levels of adaptive learning, tailored to your child's individual progress and abilities. The app is available for free on the App Store and Play Store, with no in-app purchases required.

**Compatible with a Range of Devices**

The Plugo STEM Pack is compatible with a range of devices, including:

* iOS: iPhone 6 and above, iPad 5th Gen and above (excluding iPad Mini 1 and iPad Pro 12.9")
* Android: Devices with Android 8 and above, 2GB RAM, and a front camera positioned at the top centre (excluding 10" screen tablets and above)
* Amazon Fire: Supported models include 7 - 2022, 8 - 2018 & 2020, and 8+ - 2020

**Give the Gift of Learning**

The Plugo STEM Pack is the perfect gift for boys and girls who love to learn and explore. With its comprehensive range of educational activities and games, this kit is sure to provide hours of fun and engaging learning for your child.

**Order Now and Unlock Your Child's Full Potential**

Don't wait – order the Plugo STEM Pack by PlayShifu today and give your child the gift of a lifelong love of learning.
